===Etymology===
Probably from {{etyl|ltc|ja|sort=こうせい}} compound {{m|ltc|恒星|tr=hong seng||fixed star}}. Compare modern {{cog|zh|恒星|tr=héngxīng}}. Used as a translation for the {{etyl|en|-}} term {{m|en|fixed star}}.

===Pronunciation===
* {{l|ja|sc=Latn|音読み|On'yomi}}
* {{ja-accent-common|h|こ|うせい}}<ref name="NHK">{{R:NHK Hatsuon}}</ref>
* {{IPA|lang=ja|[ko̞ːse̞ː]}}

===Noun===
{{ja-noun|こうせい|kyu=恆星}}

# {{lb|ja|sort=こうせい|astronomy}} a [[fixed star]]: a star that does not appear to [[move]] relative to other [[celestial]] [[object]]s

* {{ja-l|恒星月|こうせいげつ|kōseigetsu}}: [[stellar]] [[astronomy]]
* {{ja-l|恒星光行差|こうせいこうこうさ|kōsei kōkōsa}}: a [[stellar]] [[aberration]], an [[aberration of light]]
* {{ja-l|恒星時|こうせいじ|kōseiji}}: [[sidereal time]]
* {{ja-l|恒星日|こうせいじつ|kōseijitsu}}: a [[sidereal day]]
* {{ja-l|恒星図|こうせいず|kōseizu}}: a [[star chart]]
* {{ja-l|恒星天|こうせいてん|kōseiten}}: the ancient Greek theory of the [[heavens]] with the Earth at the center of seven [[concentric]] [[spheres]]
* {{ja-l|恒星天文学|こうせいてんもんがく|kōsei tenmongaku}}:
* {{ja-l|恒星年|こうせいねん|kōseinen}}: a [[sidereal year]]
* {{ja-l|恒星表|こうせいひょう|kōseihyō}}: a [[star catalogue]]
* {{ja-l|恒星目録|こうせいもくろく|kōsei mokuroku}}: a [[star catalogue]]
{{der-bottom}}
